last_episode_to_air.name: The Letters
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ha Jin leaves the palace to live with Jung, but her condition worsens. Will she and So reunite before it's too late?

name: Scarlet Heart: Ryeo
overview: A story of a 25-year old Go Ha-jin who is transported back in time to the Goryeo Dynasty. She then wakes up in the body of Lady Hae-soo and finds herself amongst the ruling princes of the Wang Family.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: During a solar eclipse, Go Ha Jin is magically transported from the present day to the Goryeo Dynasty in 10th century Korea. Further complicating matters, she finds herself stuck in the body of a young woman named Hae Soo.

tagline: I'll be waiting for you, even if it's for a thousand years.

episodes.name: Traveling Back to Goryeo
episodes.overview: After seemingly drowning in the present day, Ha Jin wakes up in the Goryeo era, assuming the body of Lady Hae Soo. The princes of the palace nervously await the return of their brother, 4th Prince Wang So.

episodes.name: So's Real Face
episodes.overview: Ha Jin's feisty behavior gets her into trouble with Prince Eun, as well as the mysterious, and dangerous, Prince So. The spiritual ritual ceremony arrives.

episodes.name: The One Behind
episodes.overview: So and Wook realize something troubling in the forest. Ha Jin tries to more convincingly assume her new identity.

episodes.name: Staying in Songak
episodes.overview: Lady Hae feels as though she has not fulfilled her duties as a wife to Wook. Ha Jin begins to better understand So.

episodes.name: The First Time I Met You
episodes.overview: Ha Jin tries to push aside her feelings for Wook, while Myung Hee tries to push the two closer together. So adjusts to his new life in the palace, though not everyone is delighted by his presence.

episodes.name: Hae Su Cut Her Wrist
episodes.overview: Ha Jin is informed that she will be getting married. She is reluctant, but her betrothed is a man whose grasp is difficult to escape.

episodes.name: A Court Lady in Damiwon
episodes.overview: Ha Jin's new life as a court lady presents more challenges than expected. The palace celebrates Eun's birthday.

episodes.name: The Ritual Ceremony
episodes.overview: Ha Jin discovers the real reason Court Lady Oh is so strict with her. A rain ritual is planned to help end the drought.

episodes.name: He is King Gwangjong
episodes.overview: Ha Jin realizes which prince will become King Gwangjong and wonders if she can change the future. A royal marriage is determined.

episodes.name: The Proposal
episodes.overview: Wook begins to feel threatened by So's relationship with "Soo." News of the Crown Prince's family causes trouble for him within the palace.

episodes.name: Begging for Forgiveness
episodes.overview: Ha Jin is placed under arrest for poisoning So, and Wook must prove her innocence before it is too late.

episodes.name: Assassinate the King
episodes.overview: Ha Jin is demoted to a water maid while So is sent away to Later Jin. One year later, the peace gathering approaches.

episodes.name: The Rebellion
episodes.overview: The king sends Ha Jin on an imperative mission, but to succeed, she must learn who she can and cannot trust.

episodes.name: Opening Up
episodes.overview: So must make a sacrifice for the sake of the king and his daughter. The princes are stunned to reunite with a familiar face.

episodes.name: Looking for Eun and His Wife
episodes.overview: King Jeongjong sends So after Eun for "plotting treason," and Ha Jin is again unsure of who she can trust.

episodes.name: A Test
episodes.overview: Eun and Soon Deok try to escape the Damiwon. So decides that he must become King of Goryeo, which means he must make sacrifices.

episodes.name: Goryeo's 3rd King
episodes.overview: Yo's mental and physical health continue to dwindle, and So takes advantage. Yeon Hwa and Queen Hwangbo come up with a new plan for the future of their family.

episodes.name: The Empress
episodes.overview: So is pressured to marry Yeon Hwa. Queen Mother Yoo falls ill upon hearing that Jung is being punished.

episodes.name: Leaving the Palace
episodes.overview: Baek Ah is chosen to lead soldiers in pacifying the slaves of Hubaekje. Jung reveals to So his plan to marry Soo and take her away from the palace.

episodes.name: The Letters
episodes.overview: Ha Jin leaves the palace to live with Jung, but her condition worsens. Will she and So reunite before it's too late?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: During a solar eclipse, Go Ha Jin is magically transported from the present day to the Goryeo Dynasty in 10th century Korea. Further complicating matters, she finds herself stuck in the body of a young woman named Hae Soo.
